task-056.title: Audit Log: Schema + Write Layer
task-056.summary: Added audit_logs table with all required columns (id, user_id, action, resource_type, resource_id, details, ip_address, user_agent, created_at), created index on (user_id, created_at DESC) for fast queries, implemented logAuditEvent() helper function with TypeScript types, and tested with successful record insertion.
